title: Luxury is Built-In. Not Tacked On.
posting_body: ['M2 Apartments in Denver, CO', 'M2 Apartments are the newest luxury apartments for rent in Littleton, CO.', "With a fresh look at apartment living near Englewood, you'll find that an
